popups.selectMapToLoad: Seleziona uno slot da cui caricare la mappa:
popups.emptyZoneChosen: Hai selezionato una zona vuota da pulire. Per favore creala prima.
popups.tooManyZones: Hai selezionato {{count}} zone. Il massimo possibile è 5 zone.
popups.invalidMapName: Il nome può contenere solo caratteri, numeri spazi e trattini.
popups.waitMapTicks: La mappa sta per essere sostituita. Attendi {{seconds}} secondi...
popups.waitMapEncourage: Le azioni richieste dovrebbero essere terminate.

map.confirmFullCleaning: Impossibile inziare la pulizia a zona: nessuna zona selezionata. Vuoi iniziare una pulizia completa?
map.tooManyZones: Impossibile aggiungere più di 5 zone alla piantina.

zones.noZonesConfigured: Nessuna zona è stata ancora configurata.
zones.noSpotsConfigured: Nessuno spot è stato ancora configurato.
zones.noPersistentData: Dati persistenti disabilitati o non disponibili, impossibile configurare zone proibite.
zones.enterZoneName: Si prega di inserire un nome per la zona
zones.enterSpotName: Si prega di inserire un nome per lo spot
zones.renameZone: Inserire un nuovo nome per la zona "{{zone}}":
zones.renameSpot: Inserire un nuovo nome per lo spot "{{spot}}":
zones.confirmDeleteSpot: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare lo spot "{{spot}}"?
zones.confirmDeleteZone: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare la zona "{{zone}}"?
zones.tooManySubzones: Non puoi aggiungere piàù di 5 sottozone in una singola zona.
zones.tooManyMarkers: Non puoi aggiungere altre zone proibite alla piantina!

settings.title: Impostazioni
settings.timersDesc: Gestisci timers e impostazioni della timezone
settings.persistentDataDesc: Configura il lab mode per abilitare i muri virtuali ecc
settings.consumablesDesc: Visualizza/resetta i contatori dei componenti consumabili
settings.soundAndVoiceDesc: Modifica i suoni e il volume del robot
settings.accessControlDesc: Configura la chiave SSH e l'autenticazione HTTP

accessControl.disableKeys: Disabilita il caricamento della Chiave SSH permanentemente

carpetMode.explanation: Nella Modalità Tappeto, il robot riconoscerà i tappeti automaticamente e aumenterà la potenza di aspirazione.
carpetMode.warning: Modifica i parametri seguenti solo se sai cosa stai facendo!
carpetMode.confirm: Vuoi veramente salvare le modifiche alla Modalità Tappeto?

cleaningHistory.unknownState: clean_record_map ha restituito un valore sconosciuto: {{state}}

info.firmwareUpdateWarning: Questa azione proverà ad aggiornare il firmware del dispositivo usando l'URL manuale al file pkg e il suo MD5 hash.
info.firmwareUpdateEnterURL: Per favore inserisci l'URL al firmware con file pkg:
info.firmwareUpdateEnterMD5: Per favore inserisci l'MD5 hash del file che hai selezionato:
info.firmwareUpdateSentOK: Richiesta di aggiornamento inviata! Attendi indicazione dai LED per il processo di aggiornamento.

persistentData.explanation: Persistent data or "lab mode" is a feature of the Roborock S5x which allows saving forbidden zones and virtual walls. It also allows the robot to drive back to the dock wherever it is and keeps the map from being rotated.
persistentData.notSupported: Sorry, only Roborock S5x supports the persistent map features.
persistentData.genericOverwriteWarning: Previously saved data will be overwritten.
persistentData.deleteDataTitle: This deletes the current map, all forbidden zones and virtual walls!
persistentData.deleteDataConfirm: This deletes the currently saved map, all forbidden zones and virtual walls.
persistentData.exportDesc: Export forbidden markers to Valetudo config
persistentData.exportTitle: This exports forbidden zones and virtual walls data from firmware and saves it in Valetudo
persistentData.exportConfirm: This exports forbidden zones and virtual walls from device's firmware and saves them to Valetudo configuration.
persistentData.importDesc: Import forbidden markers from Valetudo config
persistentData.importTitle: This imports forbidden zones and virtual walls data from Valetudo and sets it in firmware
persistentData.importConfirm: This imports forbidden zones and virtual walls from Valetudo configuration and sets them in device's firmware.

soundAndVoice.voicePackMissing: Please select a voice pack before uploading.

timers.name: Name:
timers.timerZoneDesc: Choose timer name and zone coordinates.
timers.timerTimeDesc: Select time and date the timer should be triggered on.
timers.timerDaysDesc: Select the days the timer should be triggered on.
timers.currentTimezone: Your current timezone is set to:
timers.noZonedCleaningSchedule: No zoned cleaning schedule is configured yet.
timers.noCleaningSchedule: No cleaning schedule is configured yet.
timers.confirmDeleteTimer: Do you really want to delete this timer?
timers.confirmTimezone: Do you really want to set your timezone to "{{newTimezone}}"?
timers.noDNDEnabled: There is no DND timer enabled yet.
timers.DNDSchedule: DND will start at {{startHour}}:{{startMinute}} and end on {{endHour}}:{{endMinute}}
timers.noDNDSchedule: No DND schedule is configured yet.
timers.confirmDisableDND: Do you really want to disable DND?
timers.tooManyZones: You can't use more than 5 zones in one cleaning session.
timers.notEnoughDataDND: Could not save DND Timer since not all required attributes are provided!
timers.missingHoursMinutes: Both minutes and hours must be specified.
timers.missingZones: One or more non-empty zones must be specified.

webInterface.explanation: These parameters affect some functionality of the web interface itself. They are local to your browser only and applied instantly
webInterface.zonedImmediateExt: instead of proceeding to the map tab
webInterface.gotoImmediateExt: instead of proceeding to the map tab
webInterface.multimapButtonsExt: allows saving and restoring maps (highly experimental!)
webInterface.hideMapStatus: Do not show status on map
webInterface.hideMapStatusExt: hides the block with status text
webInterface.disableMapReloadExt: hides force reload button on the map
webInterface.disableDynamicButtonsExt: shows on map basic buttons only
webInterface.applyLocalizationConfirm: Would you like to apply localization changes now?
webInterface.enableMultimapConfirm: This feature is not a part of roborock functionality but rather a number of hacks around it. While it may work well, it could also cause a factory reset if something unexpectedly goes wrong. Do you still want to continue?

wifi.confirm: Are you sure you want to apply the new Wifi settings?
wifi.hintText: You can always revert back to the integrated Wifi Hotspot by pressing the reset button located underneath the lid.
wifi.appliedOK: Successfully applied new wifi credentials. After pressing OK the page will refresh. However, you will most likely need to change the URL since the robot will try to connect to the new Wifi.

errors.n3: Cliff sensors alarm, carry the robot to different place
errors.n8: Device stuck, carry the robot to different place
errors.n9: Dust collector missing or bad filter
errors.n16: Surface is not flat, carry the robot to different place
errors.n21: Top cover of laser distance sensor pinned
errors.n23: Signal emission area on the dock dirty
errors.n24: Forbidden area detected, evacuate the robot to allowed place
